name: Hills Learning

description: Offers group and private lessons for Japanese, Korean, Cantonese, Chinese, Thai, Arabic, and Vietnamese, both in-person and online. They emphasize a student-oriented approach and native-speaking teachers

address: Multiple locations, including Woodside and Flushing. (e.g., 61-20 Woodside Ave, Woodside, NY 11377, United States)
